channel.title: CERT.at - Blog
channel.description: This feed contains the blog from www.CERT.at

description.p: The EU is spearheading the "AI Regulation Framework" under the Horizon Europe Programme, aimed at ethical AI development.
This framework emphasizes the need for ethical guidelines and AI governance, encouraging international cooperation.

item.title: Green Tech Innovations in Energy Sector

description.p: Launching the "Green Tech Initiative" for sustainable energy, focusing on renewable resources and reducing carbon footprints.
This initiative seeks to promote green technology innovations across Europe, targeting zero emissions by 2050.

item.dc:creator: GreenTechNews.org

description.p: The EU unveils new projects under the "European Space Strategy" for enhanced exploration and commercial opportunities in outer space.
This strategy aims to position Europe as a leading force in space exploration and satellite technology.
